text: 2nd time eating here. Enjoyed the chicken rice üëç chicken is very tender with tasty sauce. Rice is nice too. Did not have any unpleasant service experience so far.
Had a good experience ordering with the auntie, unlike the reviews below. Generous portion even for $4+1 for the gizzards. She assumed it was takeaway but later switch to eat-in when I told her.

I always order the roasted chicken rice here, never lets me down. The food is always consistent.

Honestly shocked by the number of bad reviews. As a sgporean who grew up eating chicken rice, i can say it is one of the best tasting, the chicken, sauce and rice. It is probably of the location that is why customers expect a 5 star service. As someone who also grew up with markets, hawkers and food centres, i understand the service provided and have no issues with it. After all, i come to a food centre to expect good affordable delicious food, and not for great service.

Thanks for the amazing roasted chicken rice as usual team!

If the boss is reading this, the lady you‚Äôve employed is not worth the salary you are employing her for. I would not return purely because of her.
When asked how much a portion of chicken is (without rice), she points at the wordy board and say Prices all stated, look at it yourself - ironically it didn‚Äôt state what I wanted.

When I say I want 1 person portion of chicken (only) she asks big or small.
When I say big, she then asks $7 or $8.
I didn‚Äôt know a 1 person portion then has so many sub categories to choose from.
What is the difference ? She didn‚Äôt answer.

When the kind uncle inside asks which part of chicken I want, she shushes him up before I can answer. ‚ÄúJust give anything‚Äù she said to him.

My 2nd time ordering this chicken rice. I ordered a plate of chicken rice and the lady asked if I want a small or big plate. I told her small plate will do. She collected $4 from me and the next moment she informed me that she left with only ‚Äòji wei‚ÄôÈ∏°Â∞æ.

She told me it is near the thigh and it will cost $7. I was very hungry so I just go ahead with her suggestion. I gave her another $3, hoping that she didn‚Äôt cheat me.

The next day, I went back to the hawker centre and realised that chicken drumstick is $5. I wonder where did this $7 come from???

Well, this lady obviously dishonest and has no integrity. Definitely will not patronise this store again! I would love to give them a zero star if Google allows.
